description:
In this ironic Polish seriocomedy, Tomek (Olaf Lubaszenko), a young shy postal worker, worships Magda (Grazyna 

Szapolowska) from afar -- literally, peering at her through spyglasses. She shatters his illusions about pure, ideal love by 

stating matter-of-factly that she believes only in sex. Despondent, he tries to forget her, and when this fails, he attempts 

to kill himself. Upon recovering from his botched suicide, Tomek is amazed to learn that Magda has become hopelessly 

infatuated with him.
